thread.title: Google Posts now gives museums, movies, musicians & sports groups dedicated space in search
thread.title_full: Google Posts now gives museums, movies, musicians & sports groups dedicated space in search

author: Danny Sullivan
title: Google Posts now gives museums, movies, musicians & sports groups dedicated space in search
text:
Program opens in US and Brazil. Expansion is a sign Google no longer sees it as just an experiment. The post Google Posts now gives museums, movies, musicians & sports groups dedicated space in search appeared first on Search Engine Land.

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
